name: Effective Barrier Density (severity-weighted #/km)
functionStatement: Few barriers occur within the connected corridor; passage is maintained for organisms and sediment.
descriptionMarkdown: Severity-weighted barrier density per km (e.g., sum of (1passability) per km). Lower is better.
howToMeasureMarkdown: Compile barriers; assign passability (01); compute ?(1passability)/km within analysis corridor.
